data.name: Our Mountain
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist Now


About the Game


Charles, A man who lives peacefully in the countryside. One day he has a serious problem and has to return back to the city that is located on the other side of the valley. Walking along the woods that will lead to the city. Enjoy the scenery and soundtracks. Explore the different sights around places to understand and solve the mystery that the story has created.


  • A short video game that can be completed in one play.
  • Chilling and relaxing rather than puzzles or actions.
  • Doesn’t require any good gaming skills.
  • Enjoy the soundtracks and no rush!
  • Connect and understand the story with your own idea.
  • Cute puppy following you.

data.short_description: Charles, A man who lives peacefully in the countryside. One day he has a serious problem and has to return back to the city that is located on the other side of the valley.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Thai
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 or above (64-bit Operation System)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 or above (64-bit Operation System)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1650 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
